author: Christian Child
comment: Great idea and well executed. Except for some reason there is a yellow stain colour on my Sony SW3. Its right in the centre where the white is whitest...but its yellow instead. No option/settings either so right now I'm not going to use it. Will keep checking back though cos I like the concept. Could incorporate step counter...? Edit: reply to response - just checked again on my SW3, on all brightness settings the whitest white is yellow. Can email a picture if you require....

reply.author: Udell Enterprises, Inc
reply.content: This app store isn't a good support forum. If you could email us directly with a screenshot (which you can do from the Android Wear app on your phone) we'll look into it.

title: Looks great but...

author: David McJunkin
comment: Perhaps my favorite watch face, there are so few good square face designs. Most are just a round face made smaller to fit within the square. I love how the face is dark until you need to check the time, then it becomes black on white and the seconds appear making the most of your battery with an OLED display. This is simple and makes the most use out of the real estate of a square face, using with a Polar M600.

author: Gary Awalt
comment: It works well with my Sony Smartwatch 3. Only thing I'd change is between 5 min intervals is have mark for each minute. (ie: 4 small lines or dots). Looks good otherwise. Good job!
title: Nice

author: Raymond Keattch
comment: Very nice watch face using a unique way to show the time.  Only thing I would like to see is a mark for each minute on the minute scale.  I control trains in the UK and would like to use this watch face, but It is not possible to glance at the watch and see how many minutes past the hour it is.
title: Great

author: Anas Hady
comment: But the cylinder tape effect doesn't present very well on the Sony Smartwatch 3 and just looks like a vertical yellow patch along the middle.  Gradation / fade correction?

reply.author: Udell Enterprises, Inc
reply.content: I'm not seeing this on my SW3. Could you send me a screenshot, and I'll look into it?

title: Great face for Android wear

author: Andy Osier
comment: I like it a lot, but I wish the hour numbers were center justified over the tick mark like in the screenshot. For me the hour numbers are to the right of the tick mark.

reply.author: Udell Enterprises, Inc
reply.content: What you describe is a bug that we're aware of. It manifests when you have your device set to 12 hour rather than 24 hour display. Please be patient and we'll have a fix out when we can.

title: Hours

author: Anjum Vahanvati
comment: Like the style but I wish there were other fonts to choose

reply.author: Udell Enterprises, Inc
reply.content: Thanks for the suggestion - we'll look into doing that.

title: Love the watchface, Hate the font

author: James Gilliland
comment: In the screen shots show a black version of the watch face, but I can't find any option for it. Also, unrelated once the time didn't update and displayed the wrong time.

reply.author: Udell Enterprises, Inc
reply.content: The black version is the ambient appearance of the watch face. We're hoping to release a version with colour options in the future but can make no promises on timescale.

title: How to get black watch face?

author: Pradip Pant
comment: Like the face on my moto 360.  I have one suggestion though.  With present configuration,  you need to guess the minute between the 5 minutes interval. I suggest the actual minute is displayed.  For others, the demarcation  and center red line are clear enough.
title: Like the face

author: Vadim Atlygin
comment: Really like this watch face. The only downside is that I wish ambient display could be used as main as well. It's black and blends well with watch borders and have enough information at glance already. Plus it is more contrast and easier to read.

reply.author: Udell Enterprises, Inc
reply.content: This is on my to-do list. Technically, though, it is the same amount of contrast: black against white == white against black. :^)

comment: It looks really cool, but it's not showing up for my G Watch. Not on the Android Wear app or the watch itself. I can't find it anywhere. Help?

reply.author: Udell Enterprises, Inc
reply.content: Assuming you have the app installed on the linked phone, this sounds like Wear didn't transfer the face over to the watch. Try rebooting the watch (give it a minute afterwards), and if that doesn't work, open the Android Wear app, go to Settings for your G Watch, and hit Resync Apps (which will also take a few minutes).

title: Umm?

author: Olivier de Jong
comment: Comes out great on square screen watch. Unfortunately not customisable .
title: Beatiful watch face

author: Mark Whitwell
comment: This face is surprisingly easy to read at a glance. It gives the face on sm3 some depth. Great work guys.
title: Fantastic watch face

author: Wayne Thomas
comment: My favourite watch fave for my Huawei watch.  Love the classic black and old style white combined look.

author: Koda Johnston
comment: Good but would be nice to be able to set the colours.  I prefer a black background at all times.

author: Ariel Buk
comment: I love this watch face, but can't change the colors on my fossil watch :(

reply.author: Udell Enterprises, Inc
reply.content: Color options should be coming in an update to this face for Wear 2.0. Thanks for your patience!

title: Love it, but

author: Shonn Burton
comment: Unique design. Easy to read. Everyone that sees it loves it too!
title: Favorite watch face yet!

author: Ehsan Derakhshanniya
comment: I like itttttttttt . Thank you

author: BR Colgrove
comment: Almost perfect. Should have the option to use dark mode only.

author: Jason King
comment: Watch face
title: Watch your face

author: Omar Lugo
comment: Best watch and favorite remember. Classic time of life.

author: Shoakbar Xamidov
comment: Very good thx, so much

author: kaushik sheth
comment: No
title: Watch

author: José Filipe de la Fuente
comment: Great idea. Congratulations
title: Brilliant

author: Damon Bowles
comment: Wonderfully different.
title: Works great

author: Davey B
comment: Good design
title: Great Watch

author: yudi widiarto
comment: Very nice

author: Evans Gyamfi
comment: Watch

author: Arno G
comment: Somewhat different

author: Scott Schuler
comment: Very nice

author: Muhammad Arman
comment: Excellent and simple

author: akhter ali
comment: Good

author: Sorin
comment: Interesting

author: XIANG HUANG
comment: Thanks for the quick reply! I really wish the user would be able to choose "white on black" face when the watch is awake. That would be really neat.         Thank you developer for such a elegant work. Could you use the empty space at top to indicate battery level? Also how come I can't choose white on black on my Moto 360?  Thanks.

reply.author: Udell Enterprises, Inc
reply.content: I'm already considering adding a battery meter for the next release - but not all layouts have empty space at the top, so it's not that simple. As for the colors, it uses white-on-black in ambient mode, and black-on-white when the watch is "awake".

author: Kirk Statler
comment: Very unique and attention getting. Also very stingy on battery. LG G watch I can squeeze out 34hrs with screen constant on.
title: Outstanding!

author: jonathon marks
comment: I love this watch face, it looks great and hides the black bar nicely on the moto 360. I had issued with the previous version but the recent update seems to have sorted them out.

reply.author: Udell Enterprises, Inc
reply.content: Glad it's working out for you.

title: My favorite watch face

author: Tony Thompson
comment: I really like this layout. Would be nice if you could add a discrete meter displaying the battery life.

author: Jon Inman
comment: I too would love to see an all dark option.  Otherwise it is my favorite watch face.
title: Dark?

author: Ted Miller
comment: I like this very much. Would suggest gray or silver gradient to make it easier to read even on dim screen
title: Unique
